# Diamond Hook Package

This repository contains the Diamond Hook package for Uniswap v4.

## Quick Links

- **[README.md](../README.md)** - Main documentation
- **[USAGE.md](../USAGE.md)** - Detailed usage guide
- **[PUBLISHING.md](../PUBLISHING.md)** - Publishing instructions

## Installation

```bash
forge install VanshSahay/diamond-hook
```

## Core Contract

`HookDiamond` - A Uniswap v4 hook that IS a diamond proxy, enabling modular hook logic through facets.
